en: Exhibition of the EU Prize for Contemporary Architecture - Mies van der Rohe Award 2013

The forty projects selected in last year’s edition of ‘European Union Prize for Contemporary Architecture – Mies van der Rohe Award’ are presented in a travelling exhibition which can be found in M – Museum Leuven, Belgium 10 October - 30 November 2014.
57-Web home page (text, logo, image of a department)
Exhibition of the EU Prize for Contemporary Architecture - Mies van der Rohe Award 2013

The exhibition is a showcase of striking contemporary architecture from all over Europe, summed up in images, models and succinct texts.


Production: Fundació Mies van der Rohe Barcelona

Organisation: Stad en Architectuur vzw in collaboration with M - Museum Leuven
